name: DEAD TARGET VR: Zombie Intensified
description: Survive the Zombie Intensified, Face to Dead and Fear
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Version 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
